settings.content: To test this feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to test mode.

settings.label: Days until popup is displayed again

settings.content: Before enabling reviews you will need to install the free [Shopify Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app.

settings.label: Display star rating on collection thumbnails
Display star rating on product page

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in their default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Show collection count on All page
Show groups with only one item
Scroll each group if too large
Force all filters to be drop downs
Hide filter group headers on drop downs

settings.content: Groups will only layout horizontal if there is space, so if the filters are in your sidebar this may not have any effect.

settings.label: Show unused/ungrouped tags as a 'Tags' group

settings.content: Grouped tags use the format Group Name_Filter Value. e.g. Format_USB, or Compatibility_X Box One X

settings.label: Display 'Sort By' group as a drop down box

settings.content: Leave empty to hide a sort option
Basic CSS mode may not work on all themes. Use Advanced mode to set the appropriate CSS selector. Or use the JavaScript fallback

settings.label: Set sticky offset from the top of the window
Minimum screen width to activate sticky mode

settings.content: The content selector is a CSS selector that includes the Filter Menu and products
Any scripts to run after the Ajax load is complete.

settings.label: Disable outlines shown on filter groups
'Clear All' goes to current collection, not all products
Disable the display of the Filter Menu temporarily
